lead_paragraph: Hooliganism is making a comeback, and the timing could be bad with four high-risk matches in the first week of the European Championship in a country where the police force is already under huge strain.

headline.print_headline: Soccer Hooliganism Still a Threat Heading Into Euro 2016
headline.main: Soccer Hooliganism Still a Threat Heading Into Euro 2016
